title.rendered: Vanessa Ponce (Miss World 2018) Wiki, Age, Boyfriend, Family, Biography & More

content.rendered:
Vanessa Ponce de León is a Mexican model, crowned Miss World 2018; becoming the first Mexican to clinch the title. Let’s have a look at Vannesa Ponce’s life history and some interesting facts about her.

Contents

  • Biography/Wiki
  • Physical Appearance
  • Family, Boyfriend & Religion
  • Career
  • Favourite things
  • Facts

Biography/Wiki

Vanessa Ponce was born on March 7, 1992 (age 26; as in 2018) in Guanajuato City, Guanajuato, Mexico. She holds a degree in International Business and a Diploma in Human Rights. She is a qualified Open Water Scuba Diver. She entered the field of modelling after she won the Cycle 5 of Mexico’s Next Top Model in 2014 and since then there has been no looking back for her. 

View this post on Instagram

Extrañando las aguas cristalinas Cozumeleñas… ————————————- Missing the crystal clear water of Cozumel… #home #advanceopenwater #padi #missmexicoorg #missworld

A post shared by Vanessa Ponce de Leon (@vanessaponcedeleon) on Sep 20, 2018 at 10:32am PDT

In 2018, Vanessa Ponce was on the Board of Directors of ‘Migrantes en el Camino’, a Rehab Centre for Girls. She also speaks regularly at the National Youth Institute.

View this post on Instagram

Lo logramos! Entregamos el premio de Belleza con Propósito! 50 mil pesos para los hijos de jornaleros indígenas migrantes. Pero qué significa esto? significa que cubrimos gran parte de la cuota alimenticia de programa! Dos comidas al día para los niños por 3 meses! Gracias @missmexicoorg #prosesa y #fundacionestelarojas por hacerlo posible y apoyar a la niñez mexicana! ———————————— We did it! We officially delivered the beauty with a purpose prize! 50 thousand pesos to the kids of the indigenous migrants. But what does this means? It means that we covered almost all the feeding needs of the kids. Three months of meals for this angels! Thank you @missmexicoorg, #prosesa and #fundacionestelarojas for supporting the childhood in Mexico and making all of these possible! #bwap #missworld #missmexicoorg

A post shared by Vanessa Ponce de Leon (@vanessaponcedeleon) on Sep 5, 2018 at 5:14pm PDT

Vanessa has also been a part of various campaigns for brands like Tommy Hilfiger, Dolce & Gabbana and many more.

Physical Appearance

The brown-eyed Mexican beauty is 5’ 8” tall, weighs around 55 kg, and has brown hair. Her zodiac sign is Pisces. 

Family, Boyfriend & Religion

Vanessa is a Christian, born in a middle-class Mexican family. She has a younger brother.

View this post on Instagram

El más guapo de todos! El hombre de mi vida por siempre ❤️❤️❤️ te amo hermanito! #familysunday #brothersisterlove #handsome #yanoesunbebe #lesaliobarba #noquieroquecrezcamas

A post shared by Vanessa Ponce de Leon (@vanessaponcedeleon) on Nov 29, 2015 at 3:12pm PST

Vanessa Ponce is very close to her mother and considers her mother as her best friend.

View this post on Instagram

Sin ti mamá, no hubiera aprendido soñar. #LaAmo #GraciasMamá #livingthedream

A post shared by Vanessa Ponce de Leon (@vanessaponcedeleon) on Dec 21, 2014 at 4:43pm PST

View this post on Instagram

Lo mejor es hacer sentir orgullosa a tu mamá y regresarle un poquito de lo mucho que te ha dado. Te amo mami. ¡Gracias MxNTM! #bestfriends #mntm #blessed #dreamscometrue #unconditionallove

A post shared by Vanessa Ponce de Leon (@vanessaponcedeleon) on Dec 16, 2014 at 8:39am PST

Not much information is known about her family and boyfriend. 

Career

Vanessa Ponce, prior to winning the Miss World title, volunteered with an organization Migrantes en el Camino; which provides shelter to the needy in one of the poorest regions of Oaxaca, a state in Mexico. Other than volunteering, Ponce is a speaker at the National Youth Institute in Mexico, which handles policies relevant to the youth.

Vanessa Ponce shot to fame when she won the Cycle 5 of Mexico’s Next Top Model in 2014. Further, Ponce was crowned the “Miss World Mexico 2018″ on May 5, 2018. In December 2018, she hit the headlines by winning the beauty pageant Miss World 2018; making her the first ever Mexican to be crowned the Miss World. Miss World 2017, Manushi Chillar, crowned her the Miss World 2018.

View this post on Instagram

The new #MissWorld2018 and successor of Manushi Chhillar is Mexican beauty Vanessa Ponce De Leon. The 68th Miss world winner is the first Mexican to be crowned as Miss World. #bollywoodsongs #bollywood #bollywooddance #bollywoodactress #bollywoodactor #bollywoodmovie #bollywoodstyle #shilpashetty #bollywoodlove #bollywoodmusic #bollywoodstar #bollywoodmovies #love #shilpashetty #india #bollywoodqueen #salmankhan #follow #bollywoodfashion #musically #bollywoodlovers #bollywoodnews #katrinakaif #hindisongs #bollywoodfans #like #music #bollywoodactors #shahrukhkhan #bhfyp

A post shared by FilmyTimeliners (@filmytimeliners) on Dec 9, 2018 at 2:35am PST

Favourite things

  • Her favourite TV show includes Downtown Abbey.
  • Vanessa likes to watch the Hollywood movie, The Prince of Egypt.
  • She loves eating Pizza.
  • Vanessa enjoys playing Volleyball.
  • Vanessa prefers Non-Vegetarian food. 

View this post on Instagram

"She was powerful, not because she wasn't scared but because she went so strongly, despite the fear" -Atticus Persigue tus sueños a pesar del miedo…tarea para esta noche de miércoles. Buenas noches estrellas fugaces ☄

A post shared by Vanessa Ponce de Leon (@vanessaponcedeleon) on Oct 11, 2017 at 8:15pm PDT

Facts

  • She enjoys painting and playing ultimate frisbee.
  • She is a qualified Open Water Scuba Diver.
  • She is an avid pet lover.

View this post on Instagram

Es hermoso, mi compañerito de las mañanas @kinglegoo @soycarolrios #puppylove #roomates #lazymorning 🦁❤️💋

A post shared by Vanessa Ponce de Leon (@vanessaponcedeleon) on Oct 12, 2016 at 11:20am PDT
